metadata.title: USN-6674-2 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-6674-1 fixed a vulnerability in Django. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   Seokchan Yoon discovered that the Django Truncator function incorrectly  handled very long HTML input. A remote attacker could possibly use this  issue to cause Django to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6674-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm4 python-django-doc - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm4 python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm4 python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm4 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
